mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.ziliaoshangchuan_name as ziliaoshangchuanName ,a.ziliaoshangchuan_types as ziliaoshangchuanTypes ,a.ziliaoshangchuan_file as ziliaoshangchuanFile ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.ziliaoshangchuan_content as ziliaoshangchuanContent ,a.ziliaoshangchuan_yesno_types as ziliaoshangchuanYesnoTypes ,a.ziliaoshangchuan_yesno_text as ziliaoshangchuanYesnoText ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM ziliaoshangchuan a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.ziliaoshangchuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.ziliaoshangchuanName},'%')
and a.ziliaoshangchuan_types = #{params.ziliaoshangchuanTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.ziliaoshangchuan_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.ziliaoshangchuanContent},'%')
and a.ziliaoshangchuan_yesno_types = #{params.ziliaoshangchuanYesnoTypes}
and a.ziliaoshangchuan_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.ziliaoshangchuanYesnoText},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
